column4: Anybody have issues with videos on youtube delaying and then acting strangely?
put the video on pause untill the buffer completes
or install the  video downloadhelper plugin for firefox and simply download the video
did you install the restricted extras?
- looks like I have it installed already.
mm    in terminal   lcpci | grep -i vga
and you already installed the nvidia driver ...yes?
did you install the nvidia driver?
ok so you already rebooted after doing that
which version of ubuntu are you running?
then I am puzzled... it should be working fine with what you have
- lemme try re-installing the flash plugin.
- Ahh, that did it, for some reason firefox was using gnash instead of the adobe plugin.
- That's strange, I installed gnash as an afterthought months ago, I wonder why it started using it over adobe, oh well, my own fault.
